metadata.title: CVE-2024-39473 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: SOF: ipc4-topology: Fix input format query of process modules withoutbase extensionIf a process module does not have base config extension then the sameformat applies to all of it's inputs and the process->base_config_ext isNULL, causing NULL dereference when specifically crafted topology andsequences used.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
